org.lenskit.eval.traintest.predict

Class PredictEvalTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lenskit.eval.traintest.predict.PredictEvalTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EvalTask

    public class PredictEvalTask
extends Object
implements EvalTask

    An eval task that attempts to predict the user’s test ratings. It is generally a bad idea, as well as pointless, to have multiple predict tasks in a single experiment.
